channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- DSGVO All in one for WP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- DSGVO All in one for WP

item.title: CVE-2022-2628|2024-08-03T00:46:03.288Z -- unknown -- dsgvo%20all%20in%20one%20for%20wp
item.description: The DSGVO All in one for WP WordPress plugin before 4.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
